data.actual_result: Border is either missing or invisible on Light mode
data.expected_result: There should be a border as on Dark mode
data.short_description: In Server Settings > Add Channel or Category, search bar doesn't have borders on Light theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settigns - Scroll down and go to "Add Channel or Category"  - Observe search bar - Repeat steps above but in Light mode
